about_the_game:
After the infamous “Silver Creek Falls” case is forcibly closed by the Norfolk Police Commissioner, Detective Sara Fitzgerald transfers to a small town in her home state of Massachusetts. What seems to be a new and peaceful life for our protagonist is soon turned upside down when a double homicide occurs in a nearby nature reserve.

From the makers of the “Silver Creek Falls” trilogy comes a new episodic mystery-adventure game series known as “The Walsingham Files”. Follow in the steps of the stalwart Detective Sara Fitzgerald as she tackles a new mind-boggling mystery that will keep you at the edge of your seat at all times.

“The Walsingham Files” features:

  • A gripping and suspenseful storyline
  • Beautiful orchestral soundtrack
  • Charming retro graphics art style
  • Difficult detective work needing to be done!

Solve the mystery!

content_descriptors.notes: Given the criminal investigation nature of this detective series, strong subjects like homicide and sexual assault are mentioned. There is also a pixel-graphic depiction of crime scenes. Strong language and profanity are frequently used. Supernatural subjects are discussed.

detailed_description:
Check out where it all started


Play Chapter 2


About the Game

After the infamous “Silver Creek Falls” case is forcibly closed by the Norfolk Police Commissioner, Detective Sara Fitzgerald transfers to a small town in her home state of Massachusetts. What seems to be a new and peaceful life for our protagonist is soon turned upside down when a double homicide occurs in a nearby nature reserve.

From the makers of the “Silver Creek Falls” trilogy comes a new episodic mystery-adventure game series known as “The Walsingham Files”. Follow in the steps of the stalwart Detective Sara Fitzgerald as she tackles a new mind-boggling mystery that will keep you at the edge of your seat at all times.

“The Walsingham Files” features:

  • A gripping and suspenseful storyline
  • Beautiful orchestral soundtrack
  • Charming retro graphics art style
  • Difficult detective work needing to be done!

Solve the mystery!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: The Walsingham Files - Chapter 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
